content.detailedDescription: This thing is hovering in the sky right now south east from my house looks like it near allen park area prolly a lil futher than that but its hovering for sure i cant tell if its disked shap but all i know is its not a star plane or helicopter its not making any trail just flashing and also seen one in gibrater different very big when i was in gibraltar area to the north this one was hugghh and red at 930 pm and disappated like nothing ive ever seen it was about a mile or two across
content.summary: Wierd thing in sky hoving

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling north on the 31 bypass near berrien springs on october 29 2011 sometime between 9-10pm. somewhere between snow road and east shawnee road on the west side of the highway i saw a very large triangle of orangish-red lights taking up the sky in my drivers side window. at first i thought it was several (5) small airplanes waiting to land at the airport in berrien springs, but the lights were constant and moved together changing pitch in a v formation. the formation was huge, and i witnessed one light of the five fade out then another seemed to take it's place. i tried to monitor it's movements further but i was driving on a highway with my son sleeping in the back seat, i then got off at the berrien springs exit on old 31 to get a safer look. once i found a spot to safely pull over (at berrien dental off the highway) the formation was still by the area i first saw it and seemed to be moving slowly. unfortunately i wasn't able to hang out long enough to see what happened. i believe what i saw was nothing "normal", but being a person of science i can't say what it was for sure.
content.summary: Very similar to the

content.detailedDescription:
While driving home on tuesday night on route 70 west heading towards chambers bridge road / cr 549 where i saw four lights in the distance. three white in a narrow, upside-down triangle and a red/blue blinking light at its 'apex'.
i dismissed it upon the first sighting believing it was a c-130 plane turning in the air to land at fort dix. after waiting in traffic i looked ahead again finding the lights hadn't really moved since i last saw them. i kept looking at it hoping to see it move across the sky but it was hovering there or moving very slowly side to side.
there wasn't enough light along the western horizon so i wasn't able to discern an outline of the object.
this report is being submitting after attending a local astronomy meeting tonight. a member mentioned seeing the object on the same date around the same time as she drove along route 9 in lakewood. she joked about it being a ufo but said it might've been a blimp.
content.summary: Large object towards horizon, no outline, four lights

content.detailedDescription:
It was a rather cold evening in mid november 2004. my father had recently become interested in telescopes and had purchased a few over the past weeks. this particular november night we had two of the telescopes out in my parent���s front yard in alvin, texas. one was a new 5 inch refractor telescope that my father had just purchased and the other was an 8 inch dobsonian style telescope that i had preferred using for my leisure after becoming comfortable with it over a couple of weeks. alvin is south of houston and from our front yard the light pollution was enough to cause some frustrations when trying to find various objects; however, one reason i preferred the dobsonian was because i could rather easily pick up some gas formations such as the nebula in orion (m42). 
it was between 12 and 1 am and the telescopes had been placed outside a few hours earlier to allow for acclimation to the weather. my father had been fooling with setting up his new telescope while i had already gazed at m42 and become bored. i was looking through the viewfinder and traversing the skies when i picked up my ���ufo.��� even through the viewfinder of a fairly powerful front yard telescope the object appeared just as a distant star would; as a tiny speck of light. the object had a greenish-white color that didn���t sparkle like a starts burning gases would. it appeared just as a planet would to the naked eye; as a constantly bright light. the objects intensity was only outdone by the star sirius.
my picking up of the object must have been much by sheer luck and accident because it was moving across the night sky in an unusual pattern. as soon as i located the object at roughly due east i began following its movement in a circle around the night sky. it is this movement that made the object peculiar to me.  i will explain it like this: imagine tying a ball to a string and spinning it around in a counterclockwise fashion above your head. the ball will rotate the central point of your body on the ground in a circle whose circumference is dictated by the length of the string. this is how the object moved. imagine that the center point was where i was standing on the ground looking at this object through the telescope. the object moved in a circle across the night sky over my head as if tethered to a string. again, i caught the object in the viewfinder at roughly due east. the object moved at a consistent speed and altitude around the sky in a circle first south, then west, next north, east again���and so on. i followed the object at least six times around the same path in the sky. if a pencil had been taped to the bottom of the telescope and a paper under it i would have drawn a perfect circle on the paper with the motion of the telescope. i would estimate the telescope was at between a 70 and 80 degree angle to the ground.
at first i thought i may be tracking the space station. however, i quickly discounted this because it is my assumption that an object in orbit would not create such a path. although i could possibly pick up an object in orbit i would have lost it over the horizon as it continued its path. this object was not orbiting the earth it was creating a giant perfect circle (as much as i could tell) in the sky above me. 
there are two large airports in the houston area; hobby is a hub for commercial flights, and depending on wind conditions we would frequently get aircraft in pattern that would fly over nearby. in fact, on this night the 737s were coming right across our sky. these planes could be picked up in the telescope by chance, but they moved so fast (even in landing patterns) that it was impossible to keep them in view through the telescope. i had even managed to pick up cessnas and similar aircraft, but because of the power of the telescope in question these too were nearly impossible to track because they would nearly take up the entire view finder when you did lock on to one. i���ve also observed plenty of meteors through the very telescope in question, and these objects do not represent the type of movement i witnessed. 
i lost the object when i attempted to get my father to track it. it would move through the entire 360 degrees of its motion in about 45 seconds, so i lost it and wasn���t able to reacquire it when my father passed on taking a look. at the time i thought nothing of it. like i said, i assumed i was looking at the space station or a satellite; however, after some time passed i began to question this assumption based on my understanding of how these objects orbit the earth. i am admittedly ignorant of the details of how manmade objects such as satellite orbit the earth, but i was confident that even if these objects were capable of the flight path i observed they would be moving too fast to even begin to be able to follow around the sky for several minutes. keeping the object in view was taking some concentration and careful adjustment that was possible only by the design parameters of a dobsonian telescope. had it been any other telescope i am confident i would have lost it early on.
content.summary: Odd behaving light witnessed through telescope.

content.detailedDescription:
Im writing for my 12 tear old.
my wife picked my daughters up from school and did a few errands. they went to burlington coat factory. my 12b year old was playing with my camera and simply took a few pictures. later that day she noticed either 1 or 2 objects in the photo. i was once a member of ky mufon , and telling you about it wa the first thing that came to mind. we hope to hear from you.
                                thanks
content.summary: At the time of photo didnt realize that there wa anything to look at

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside my apartment on my cell phone and i told the person on the other end that there was something in the sky. i immediately went inside and grabbed my camera and began taking pictures. i know i went out with a friend that night and took the camera. the next day when i checked the pics, the camera appeared to be burned of fried on the bottom. but the memory card was fine. there were only pictures of the ufo in question, not any pictures from the night out.
i dont remember taking as many pics as i did and i do not remember ever zooming in on the objects but yet that appears to be what i have pics of.
content.summary: Saw a shiny pulsating light with many colors, noticed a craft of some sort. can not remember anything from that night.

content.detailedDescription: At outback eating dinner.  as we were leaving a man came in telling everyone there were ufo's in the sky.  i joked with the hostess to no believe him. he insisted there were ufo's.  we decided to go see for ourself.  and sure enough as we drove to the walmart a little further down the road we saw three lights in the sky at first we thought it was cell phone tower lights.  then as we got closer we noticed they were free floating, pulsing like a star in the sky over the walmart on 192.  people were standing around looking at it.  then helicopters came in and they just disappeared.
content.summary: Saw three star like ufo in the sky. over a walmart.

content.detailedDescription: We were having a cookout outside at our house when we spotted what looked like a plane(we live a few miles from an airport) or star-- and thought nothing of it. however, when we noticed it was moving very slowly, we decided to keep an eye on it since planes don't move that slow and stars don't move at all. over the course of twenty minutes it had moved up then to the side, gone down and back up again and continued a random up and down pattern, all while pulsating multicolored lights.My mom sister,and i  grabbed our high power bonoculars to get a better picture of the object, we took turns looking at the object and i got a look at its definite shape for a few short seconds maybe 10 or so and quickly sketched it--it had a teardrop moon crescent shape. we felt overwhelmed with anxiousness to be witnessing such a thing and henceforth, decided to file this ufo report.
content.summary: Teardrop shape, multicolored pulsating lights.

content.detailedDescription: At my brothers house in tampa. i was outside on my cell ph i looked up towards north tampa, saw 2 starlike objects in line moving south. they stayed fairly close to one another, the rear object moved left to right as it followed. the 3rd object was less than 5 mins from the same north sky moved in a southerly direction then turned east. i called my sister in law out and she witnessed it as well. our friend came out and he witnessed the 3rd object. we were in awe. it was not an airplane or satellite.  we lost the objects in the horizon.
content.summary: 2 star like objects, one behind the other, from one end of the clear night sky to the other, the 2nd rear object moved slightly left to right , 3rd object was 4-5 mins after and moved south then east.

content.detailedDescription: We stopped at walgreens to deposit a movie in the redbox machine. my daughter was waiting to put the movie in the machine we were waiting on her. i looked out our window in the car and seen three glowing red lights that formed the shape of a chevron, slowly moving form the southeast to the northwest. as it approached a position about over the shopping center the lights began to disappear one by one. there were several people besides us  that seen this that were standing in the parking area at walgreens. i don't know what these lights were but this is not the first encounter we have had in this area. makes you kind of wonder "what going on in greensboro.
content.summary: Three red glowing lights forming a chevron shape

content.detailedDescription: Ufo
content.summary: Louisiana ufo day 3

content.detailedDescription: Day of earthquake aug 23rd 1:51 pm at job site at desk noticed something unusual left switch board to get fresh air stumbeled down stairs bumbed into exit door entered street area observed percuilar sun and shadow against building  look around went to west end of building sat down on ledge which began wobbling noticed other leaving building again noticed unusual shadow perhaps co-workers did also....Cannot be sure of the rest... about 10 plus witness..Perhaps 3-5 minutes duration from north west to south east...Reminder...End....
content.summary: Percise time of earthquake disk observed in area then accended possible creature in area..

content.detailedDescription: For the last few months from august to now i have been seeing a bright venus sized light, sometimes there are two, in the west and east at night. at first i thought it was helicopter, but it didn't move an inch for over four hours. i was in the military and am familiar with most military aircraft and what can usually be seen over the county of los angeles so i ruled out the idea of it being man made. i think it could be a planet but i know a little bit about astronomy and know what planets are in view usually. i've google star mapped it and nothing shows up, plus it blinks different colors and it is never in the same place. also the north star is the only star that i know of that doesn't move as the earth moves. this thing just stays stationary in a different place almost every night. a friend of mine saw it too. he said he saw a smaller light connect with the larger light. i don't have a camera plus it would just look like a planet on video, but i was curious if anyone else has reported this.  i think its a either a planet or maybe it's the space station, it's just sometimes there are more than one and they are not that close to each other. sorry for bothering you people. any info on this would be appreciated.
content.summary: Bright planet like light blinking light in the sky. looks like its in earth's atmosphere.

content.detailedDescription: My wife was outside waiting for me with our daughters. i went inside to get the keys to our car. as i was getting the keys to the car, i heard my wife and kids yelling for me to come outside immediately. i thought there was an emergency of some sort. i ran out immediately not knowing what to expect. as soon as i got outside, my wife and kids were pointing at the sky. i observed a large glowing orb or sphere.  there was no sound. the object appeared to spin and hover.   my wife grabbed the ipad and filmed this object.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Large glowing orb or sphere that appeared to spin

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were smoking a cigarette outside and i seen something in the sky flickering and beating lights then i noticed another one much like it and they were pretty close together and moving in a way that looked like they were watching us, but when the move it wasn't straight it was up and down when they were moving the objects were much bigger then a star and oddly shaped i was very excited and i went inside to tell everyone an they couldn't explain either i went inside after awhile because it's cold this time of night but that pretty much sums it up.
content.summary: Seen them for awhile still there hovering and flickering  thereslowly going up and and down toward the light

content.detailedDescription:
Hi, my english its not very good, but i hope so,you are understand me.
i was take this picture with mobile phone,vga cam, 19.12.2004 approximately 03:30am. this objects just stay on sky,no sound,anything..Just strong light.After 10 min lights slowly gone on..Sceptics dont trust me, but you are will see that this spheres dont hold anything..
when i go look time when pictures take on mobile,its was 12 hours early.Very interesting...
another day i was read,in indonesia people saw three spheres and one is fall..
belisce,croatia
content.summary: Ufo in croatia

content.detailedDescription:
On november 8, 2011 in tampa, florida at approximately 8:02pm (roughly) i was headed towards lee roy selmons restaurant via memorial highway to then get on the veterans expressway. i was headed towards the airport, so east. i was right by the scottish rite masonic temple in an area called "town and country" keep in mind, i live nearby to the airport and am quite used to seeing airplanes and helicopters. i have seen some ufo's in the past (about 5) but never made a report, but considering i took a video of this one, i see no excuse not to. why did i have a camera with me to go out to eat? especially my new one i just got for a trip? good question. i'm one to definitely trust my "gut" and since my buddy recently had a sighting on hilsborough and racetrack rd (my extremely skeptical friend who does not believe in this stuff), i felt the need to trust my gut and bring my camera with me. its really just for pictures (canon powershotsx 150) but videos are always fun. so yes, a gut feeling told me to bring my camera and i did. within about a mile of my house, i see this orange orb-like object quite low than what a normal airplane would be doing in the area. living by the airport, you get quite used to seeing many many objects in the sky, and i knew immediately that this object was not normal. first, it was low and i could tell it was low. i had perspective. it loooked like a floating jack o lantern, a floating pumpkin, or some sort of illuminated object. but it wasnt lit from within, it was lit on the outside as well. when i say floating, i don't mean that it was ascending, not by any means. it did not ascend at all. i saw it coming towards me, below any cloud cover and much lower than any airplane. do you realize how strange it is to see something and know immediately that it shouldn't be there? so i quick pulled over to a blocked entrance to a scottish rite masonic temple. i got my camera, turned it on and had enough time to catch the object seemingly pass over the masonic building and continue its path along memorial. memorial does curve, so it's difficult to tell which way it was heading. i want to say northwest, over the bay. not entirely sure. however, when i did see it, it was headed straight toward me (seemingly) on memorial. i got out, saw it basically above me car, but out like 300 or 400 yards. it is difficult to judge distance when you don't know the size of the object you are seeing. to me visually, it looked like a large basketball. giving off orange hue. glow, whatever you want to call it. there were no faa lights. and it was coming from the direction of the airport but not in any flight pattern i've ever seen. (when its windy, yes, the runways change) but it was too low to be an airplane from the airport, because it was unlike any flight plan i'd seen. it was moving in the same direction as memorial hwy, it was moving (from my vision) left to right if i'm facing the building that was in front of me. it did not ascend, it kept a distinct flight path. it moved quickly, but for how low it was, i would bet it was moving about 60 or 70mph. i do have contacts but i was not wearing them. way too low, not one flashing light. and thankfully, i caught  an airplance in my shot. unfortunately, i have a typical ufo video in that its shaky, and there are little reference points. i tried to do my best, but it all happened so fast. i zoomed in too much causing it to be blurry and zoom in right when the airplane was flying over it. but at least i caught that. 
so again, i saw an object, headed toward me, i saw it from my field of vision while driving. it was low enough for me to basically slam on my brakes and pull over meaning that i knew it was abnormal as far as an airplane or helicopter are concerned. it couldn't have been a hot air balloon. it couldn't have been a remote controlled helicopter and it wasn't a blimp (ive seen plenty living in tampa) however, suppose it was a chinese lantern, well, it wasn't internally lit. and it moved laterally not up. never once to did it seeem to rise in height. my first thought was "wow, that looks like a pumpkin shooting across the sky." i have seen a ball of light very similar and at the same height over st pete beach (i have no visual evidence of this event). about a year after seeing the orange ball over the beach, i googled it and found out they are seen all over florida (with video) and there is one instance in indiana, where i'm from. (i saw a pinpoint of white light fly around an airplane over grissom afb while driving by and saw an orange orb over the base as well while recounting the pinpoint of light story to my sister...) the more you get into the ufo phenomenon, the more you notice the synchronicity of when and where you see them, and yes, they do seem to know when you see them. 
so i had the sense literally immediately upon seeing this pumpkin (at this point, coming toward me) upon stopping, hopping out and grabbing the video,  the object was now over me (but i was looking up at it, not directly up, but definitely below any cloud cover and definitely low enough to realize it was way too low? hard to explain. no flashing or internal light, outside illumination only. no pulsing really, maybe a slight slow strobe, couldn't really make out a shape. i could understand if this was a remote control floating pumpkin, but darn it if it wasn't out of my sight in about a minute. what kind of long range antennae did this thing have? if it was a prank. if if if, why would they risk being so close to the airport and violating there airspace? where were any flashing lights per faa regulations? 
just another note, the sighting in june or so from the gandy bridge, the girl and her boyfriend witnessing a giant object that came up to the bridge, was an aquaintance of mine. i have friends left and right seeeing things in tampa. my guess is this, there are soooo many airplanes in the sky at all times, that a majority of people don't take notice to the objects, so in essence, its a perfect environment for them to blend in. the  sightings in clearwater and st pete (which are all within an half hour drive) are also quite frequent.
content.summary: Jack o'lantern light moving away from tampa airport, following memorial.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home from the local archery range on st rt 36 heading south as i turned right onto the road to go to my house i noticed a light off in the distance above the tree line. at that time i thought it was the crecent moon off in the distance. note what i saw was huge above the trees. i really wanted to get a closer look and hoped to get the trees out of the way so i could get a picture of what i thought was the moon. i turned left onto a road that i thought would give me the best view as i turned onto this road my radio which was working fine cut to static and my cell phone shut off when i got closer to the object maybe 300 yards it began moving off to the west behind the tree line. i thought this was very strange and as the object began moving off my radio came back on and i got several texts that i hadnt recieved since my phone quit working. i made a right to go up a hill where i thought i would have a better look but when i got up there the object was nowhere to be seen. the thing that scared me the most was i looked up to the north and could clearly see the moon up in the sky it was half full and very small compared to the object i had seen and not nearly as bright. the whole sighting only lasted four minutes when i got home i was looking up at the sky the whole way into my house trying to figure out what i might have seen. 

the object was about the size of two foot ball fields in length and maybe the width of one foot ball field wide. it was crecent shaped and a bright white color.
content.summary: At first i thought it was the crecent moon really big behind the trees but it turned out to be something totally different

content.detailedDescription:
The reason i did not entirely filled in the form is because i didn't understood everything, like i don't know how much inches a football or basketball is and couldn't find it on google :p plus english is not my language nor did i follow english class.
and i don't know which month or day it occured but i had to fill something in, rest assured it did happen in 1996 yet i think that's pretty irrelivant 

copied from my facebook, it's basically a very detailed report.

wtf flying glassy orbs containing orange smoke!?
here's the story;
when i was 8 years old i had my room shared up the attic together with my little brother ([name removed/cms/tg]). though he would probably deny what happened that very night, i can assure you anything you're about to read has truly happened.
how it happened and why i do not know yet it was so fascinating and supernatural that i still remember that day as if it were yesterday.
the reason why i did not share this with anyone else (excl. close friends) is because noone would actually believe me until recently this topic came up when i was speaking to my other (older) brothers ([name removed/cms/tg]) his girlfriend ([name removed/cms/tg] something something) who told me her mother actually saw the same thing, coinsidently she was also 8 years old when it happened and she also remembers that moment as if it were yesterday.
there was no doubt, she described it to me exactly how i remember it, in short; glassy orbs the size of a regular football containing orange smoke and making a humming sound.
now onto the real deal.
the attic is separated by a vertical wooden beam construction in the middle and on each side of the crooked walls there are a few other horizontal beams in the middle separating the walls in two, now if you got all of that, that means that i have 8 seperated wall sections which are covered in some kind of white carpet.
me and my lil brother (who was 3.5 yrs old at that time, hence i don't blame him for denying it and not truly understanding what happened that night, it's a shame though) were sleeping when we both woke up around the same moment from a rather loud humming noise, i coudln't and still can't compare it to anything i've ever heard 
when i opened my eyes the first thing i noticed was that the entire room was illuminated by a bright orange glow coming from the northern part of the attic and a strange noise coming out of nowhere, our beds were positioned next to eachother in the souther part.
i quickly noticed my brother was already hiding crying under his sheets screaming at me to make them go away, when i looked back at the light i saw 5 (damn or was it 6?) of those orbs floating below the ridge of the ceiling (where the two walls come together).
on my knees i crawled to the end of my bed and got a very clear view of the orbs as i was just 2 meters away from them, i was so scared but i had to protect my younger brother so i stood up and spread my arms as wide as i could and shouted; leave us alone, what happened next was even more extraordinary.
the orbs vanished into the walls(more like getting absorbed into the walls), half of the orbs into the eastern upper part and the rest into the western upper part, as they did they made a strange sucking sound also incomparable to anything else and when they all vanished the entire upper parts illuminated and the glow was so bright it stretched out about 2 meters on each side towards the other side, the weird part was that the light did not blinded me as it did not illuminate the rest of the room nor was it bright to look at from my point of view.
then the light slowly started to shrink until it completely vanished.
and that's the whole story.
i've looked all over the internet but anything i found about orbs is rubbish and a lot of people even though they never saw one say they can't be real, this really saddens me.
there's loads of discussions around it though but people tend to say they are other lights such as chinese candles and any pictures i've come across are bullshit, i wonder are they really that rare, howcome steph her mom saw them as well? i'm sure there's other people out there who witnessed such event and i really would appreciate it if anyone else that has any legit intel on this issue would share it with me even if it's not your own, thanks. i hope you enjoyed the story and goodnight (jebus it's 5am)

up until this day i hate myself for making them go away so fast, why didn't i touch them? why didn't i try to communicate with them? they did almost instantly vanish when i asked (insisted) them to go away... why am i so *** damn curious, argh!
:(

 i forgot to mention the "glass" which contained the smoke was a perfect round shape and around 1cm thick, and the orange smoke inside it was constantly moving. hotdamn it still makes me shiver.

 and any light in the room and coming from the walls had the exact same color as the smoke. thanks fb for and edit tool /sarcasm

 mispelled 'an' -_-
content.summary: Floating humming orbs seemingly made out of thin glass containing a smoke like substance which had a dark orange color

content.detailedDescription:
I have been a lifelong "stargazer" and a working musician since 1969. as a result i am most often wide awake and outdoors well before sunrise. before going any further...No, i do not smoke pot. i have never used psychedelics nor do i know any blues musicians that have used them. while having a smoke in front of my house at about 0400, as is usually the case, i looked up for the moon and made sure all the stars were in their places and immediately saw 3 points of light, forming a triangle, not at home. it was northeast and slightly above a 45 degree angle from the horizon, apex pointing northward, toward pleasanton/livermoore. the triangle took up about 1/10 of the northeastern quadrant. if it was a single entity it was huge. but it did appear to be simply 3 points of light. i don't look up with intent to spot a ufo. it's simply a habit of appreciating the stars and moon on clear nights. so i'm quite familiar with them. this trio was a huge red flag. i have purposely tried to spot them again, scanning the area 2-3 times a night since then and nothing even comes close to resembling them. it may not sound like much to most but this was so wrong to me that it raised an alarm. i've never seen a ship or solid object of any sort before but, besides this trio of lights, have witnessed 2 slightly unusual events in the last 1 1/2 to 2 years. in the same area of sky what appeared to be "shooting stars" shot at tremendous speed in a southerly direction right above, and parallel with, the mountainous horizon adjacent to milpitas/san jose. not too alarming...Except they weren't on a downward trajectory. they shot straight as an arrow south until reaching the horizon in a matter of about 2 seconds. i didn't think it noteworthy, even though i'm aware of the research facilities in the livermoore area, until now since my "trio of lights." i very much appreciate this being taken seriously. thank you.

bruce
content.summary: 3 points of light, starlike in triangular formation, not known constellation & not appeared since

content.detailedDescription: I was standing in my backyard smoking as i do several times a day.  noticed orb in the sky almost immediately after i sat down.  called my wife outside but she was uninterested.  i was excited because i was sure it wasn't a plane or helicopter.  took four 30 sec - 1 min vids on my cell phone as it quickly became dark outside.  partly cloudy day with no wind, so the clouds were stationary.  watched "orb" move very slowly in the sky and at times it was stationary[parked behind cloud]. eventually it moved below the horizon.
content.summary: Moved to slowly to be a plane and at times was stationary, eventually descended out of view

content.detailedDescription: My daughter was looking out the car window to the west at 3:30 p.M. when she saw a large bright flash of light above the low, clouds in the distance. she told me that it was about the size of a penny. so i looked and there was nothing until a small whitish-blue light appeared. this light was about the size of a bright planet. it disappeared and reappeared several times within the same small area of the sky, but in random places. it appeared to be staying close to the thin, dark edge of the cloud moving just below it. there were no clouds covering it. all of this took place during ten minutes. we both saw this happen and i recorded it on my cell phone. the light was too small to be seen on my phone's video but i will include it as a frame of reference.
content.summary: Large bright flash of light, disappeard and reappeared as smaller light

content.detailedDescription:
I just got home from work at 6 pm pst and as i got out of my car i looked up i see this beam of white light - ascending upward at an angle with a blue center.. and it shot acrosed the sky/horizon in a flash towards the pacific. i never seen an object move that fast and no visual after that. i have lived by the airport for years since i was a kid and know that was no airplane, jet or helicopter.

did anyone else report this?

thanks,

ryan
content.summary: I just got out of my car and happen to look up and seen a white streak of light shoot across the sky

content.detailedDescription:
Im sorry but this was many years ago and i didnt report it as in my heart of hearts i feel it to be a man made vehicle - the reason? it appeared underside to be made of matt black panels, bolts were clearly visible and the craft made a fairly noticeable rumbling noise as it went overhead - in my mind, if the craft was extraterrestrial, then i highly doubt it would be made of nuts and bolts and i assume alien tech would of done away with such a crude sounding propulsion system.

anyway i will explain the sequence of events the best i remember.

it was roughly mid morning very good visibility, my mate lived next door bar one house away from mine and i was popping around to his to see what he was up to for the day - he lived with his parents and had his own room downstairs on the side of the house. i went round the side and knocked on his door, a moment passed and he answered, as im talking to him i hear this odd noise - a sort of low pitched rumble - i look up and something black and fairly large flew over - i didnt see the whole object then, but my heart was pounding - i said to my mate, come quick! there���s a f*cking ship flying over your house (sorry for language) , he said wait while i put my boots on...Lol i thought, i dont think its going to wait for you to put your boots on... i ran back around to the front of his house to see this fairly large craft appear from the front of his house - i was stunned, i remember it flew very very low indeed - i also remember thinking to myself - try to take in as much detail about the crafts structure as i could, this is why i remember the bolts, the matt black colour of the underside and the lights - there were three circular white/yellow lights - one in each corner of the craft and two small red lights in the middle. there were no markings at all, no numbers, symbols etc - just plain matt black - i also remember thinking that it was a perfect triangle - no cut away at the rear - just as if you had drawn a triangle as is - no flaps, no vents - nothing - as the craft flew away from me (must of been travelling around 20-30mph) i remembered looking at the back trying to identify some sort of engine, but there was nothing visible except a black space - no exhaust was visible either or trail. 

the craft continued to head in the direction i had first seen it and looked like it was heading in the direction of liverpool airport. 

i also remember that at the time of the event - im not sure if it was after or before, but there had been a flurry of sightings of a similar (if not the same) craft all over merseyside - in fact there were pictures in the local paper (southport visitor) of the ship being sited over meols cop school playing field very similar to what i had seen.  i will say this, in all my research on this, i cant say ive actually seen anyone see this craft as close as i did ��� the images in the media usually show the craft very high up at night ��� this was very low and in broad daylight.


i dont know what help any of this will be - if any at all, but at least ive told someone.

i suspect this to be some sort of terestial craft.

i can provide a drawing but other than a triangle with lights in each corner and two small red lights in the middle - there's not much to gain.

let me know if you require it.

please also note that the date of the event is a total stab in the dark - i cant really remember what month / year it was specifically (i know thats not much help - sorry) all i can say is it was at least spring - maybe summer as it was a clear warm sunny morning.
content.summary: Mid morning, went to mates house next door and heard this noise, looked up and something caught my eye, ran around to front of house to see this triangler shapped craft fly low over his house and in the direction of liverpool airport

content.detailedDescription: I observed from my back porch 2 very bright stars in the sky that didn't look like the other stars at 6:37 am. on october 8, 2010 in mckinney, texas. the 2 star like objects were set up at one being at 12 o'clock and the other at lets say the center of a clock.  as i am looking at them the object at 12 oclock moved very fluidly as if on a clock to the 1,3, and then stopping at the 6 oclock position. as soon as the object stopped the center object got brighter and ascended up and backwards at what i can only describe as an unbelievable rate of speed and was gone in the blink of an eye. the object at the 6 oclock position stayed in the same position until the sun came up and i lost site of it. i was looking up at about 1/3 to 1/2 of the way up in the sky and was facing  nnw. i sit on my back porch alot and i sit on a flight path to dfw airport so i see alot of planes and even helicopters on occasion but seeing what i saw that morning was the strangest thing i have ever seen in my life. what was so eery about it was the fluid clock like motion and how perfect the circular movement was. that morning was just over a year ago and its if it just happened yesterday, i believe its one of those instances that is seared in your memory and just can't be forgotten.
content.summary: I observed 2 very bright stars in the sky that didn't look like the other stars at 6:37 am. then in a perfect pattern the one on top made a clock movement from 12 to the 6 position very fluidly and then the center object shot back and upward at a fast rat

content.detailedDescription:
This is my story that actually happened about 40 years ago, and at the time only my immediate family was told. i have told several people about the encounter the past five years after seeing so much about ufo���s on the history channel. i figured it was a more acceptable time to tell my story.

it's unique to me because i have never heard a story about seeing a ufo at the very beginning and leave the way this one did. i have never seen another ufo quite like this. i have seen a satellite, which did nothing but go across the sky at night. i think i saw a ufo last year, but it could have been a plane and it went by very fast. but this ufo was too close and too technically advanced that i knew that it came from another world and i was probably somewhat in a state of shock- unable to really think-just observe it. we also live about 30 miles from columbus air force base in mississippi and at that time there were a lot of fighter jet training going on (basic not advanced) and sonic booms were almost daily.

i was about 10 years old in the summer of 1968 (i think that���s the year) in rural mississippi. my cousin (xxxx xxxxxx) was visiting and we were both sleeping in a single bed, but xxxx was taking all the covers and kicking me. at about 2:00 am i was wide-awake. it was a very clear summer night and the stars were numerous. after looking at the stars for a few minutes, it looked as if one was falling or a ���shooting star���. but, something very unusual happened; the ���star��� quit falling! then the light, which is all i could make it out to be, slowly made its way down moving to the left (south) and down until it leveled out and came straight for our house. very much like a helicopter would do, but with no sound. in an instant there was this huge object, which i will call a ���space ship��� because of all the detail i could see, was hovering in our front yard. it was ���saucer-shaped���, or like one saucer on top of another, but not as bright as it was when in flight. the upper half of the craft seemed to have rectangular port holes and a lot of light was coming out of them. it was about as long as a school bus and close enough that i could hit it with a rock. it just stayed in one spot for a moment, and then went over the house- not making one single sound. my first reaction was to go tell mama, but when i got up to go tell her i thought she might think that i was crazy. i then went to use the bathroom. i looked out the back (bathroom) window and did not see anything. when i got back to bed, i looked out the window again and in just a few minutes the ufo went back over the house slowly, but a little higher than before and still with no sound and flew west with very little elevation, about as high as a helicopter would fly and slowly made its way up to a very high altitude and then went straight up at a tremendous velocity as fast as it had come down and disappeared in just a moment.

i told everyone in my family the next morning about it and i was surprised that they all believed me. my cousin wondered why i did not wake him up, i had tried, but he was the sleeping dead. i should have tried harder, looking back, of course.

this seemed to happen all in about 5 minutes, but after thinking about it over the years it seemed very odd that visitors would come from so far away and leave so fast. i use to think that maybe they went behind the house to the barn and took a cow or calf, but no cattle were missing. now i think i may have a loss of time due to some force on the ufo and that possibly they may have done something to one of my sisters, who lived upstairs ages 14, 15 and 18. my sister aged 15 at the time, has never had kids.
this is the story i submitted to the ufo chronicles on 1-5-08
content.summary: Mississippi 1968: hovering ufo, close enough to hit with a rock, made no sound then went over the house.

content.detailedDescription: My brother and i stepped outside to have a cigerette. after being outside olny a minute or so, he pointed and said "what's that?"  at my first glimpse i thought it was the streetlight because of the amber orange color but then i quickly realized it was on fire and it was traveling above the streetlights.  my brother kept saying its on fire!  it's on fire! i distinctly saw a fire sphere with no sound, no change of direction no change of altitude, no tail.  we watched it light up its surounding area as it traveled south until out of sight.  we heard an aircraft to the west and slightly north of the sphere.  the airplane had only strobe white lights.  the sphere traveled under the cloud deck, where as the airplane was in the clouds.  two minutes later another airplane with strobe white lights,and normal red and green avaition lights were visable and even a higher altitude than the first airplane further into the cloud deck.  i point this out because the first plane did not have red or green lights. i know what i saw over the treetops it was a fireball of orange and red flames a perfect circle traveling on its own power for the 10-20 seconds.
content.summary: Large orange fireball over the treetops, watched until out of sight

content.detailedDescription:
I was leaving the irvine spectrum shopping center after the gym around 10:20pm. i was about to get on the 5 freeway to facing north and about head south and noticed a brighter than normal star, orange and looked like it was melting. 

the location of it was about about 1 mile north east of my location. at first i thought maybe someone lit one of those heated ceremony bags and caught on fire, but after closer look the object stayed hovering and changing different colors. i would say it was hovering close to the old marine base near irvine or lake forest. 

i pulled over to the side of the road with my emergency lights and took out my iphone to start recording this thing as it was beginning to fade. the street lights made it more difficult to record the object, but i did give descriptions of where the object should be seen. i noticed small blinking lights coming from the east, these must have been air force jets scrambled from march afb to rid of the ufo. as the jets started to get closer the ufo lost it's glow and turned into off-white maybe silver color with some lights going across barely visible. the shape of this thing was uncertain, i can only describe the shape of a deformed skinny potato that was wobbling away as it would change speed. a helicopter began to investigate the object, but i believe it was told to back off because turned away from the object, but later came back to follow it north.

as the object flew north west towards the tustin hills area, then it started to curve towards los angeles.The fighter jets kept circling around, but stayed clear of the object. 

i have this on video, shows the fighter jet arriving and circling around, the helicopter investigating, but hard to see the ufo.
content.summary: South orange county fire ufo chased away by jets & helicopter

content.detailedDescription: My mom was driving me home from an appointment.Time was around 1:15pm-1:30pm. we just turned from tudor onto boniface rd. coming down the hill on boniface on object appeared from the west about a quater mile in front of us about 50feet above the trees. as it was traveling forward it descended to just above the trees and turned sharply to its left (north). now it was traveling the same direction as us along the boniface road and its started to ascend to couple thousand feet. the object flew right past the airforce base and just kept traveling north. this was not military to my belief. it was large, teardrop shaped, dark steel in color, and the surface appeared to be reflective, extremely fast, and silent. we witnessed this object for only about 15 seconds. it was very very fast. there were other cors on the road i'm sure other people seen it. about 2 minutes after i witnessed it lots of military aircraft started flying around looking for it.
content.summary: Fairly large silent extremely fast moving aircraft sighted in afternoon.
